article_text:
Here is a scene. A 9-year-old boy is given a dagger and asked: “Do you know what follows now?”: “ ‘I think so,’ the boy lord said. ‘I have to perform seppuku. But . . . I don’t know how, Lord,’ Kanno said sadly. His small shoulders wilted. ‘I was never allowed to see. I wanted to, but my father said I was too young.’ ” He performs the ritual to which the Samurai code had compelled him. He writes a poem, stabs himself in the belly and is then beheaded.
